title: The Dead Beat
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He was responsible for breaking any number of high-profile stories at the paper over the years, from the Hearts FC tax scandal to the terrible revelations about the disposal of remains at Mortonhall Crematorium.

title: Friends, Lovers, Chocolate
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'In hastening one's appointment at Mortonhall Crematorium,'  he interjected. 'No, I stopped, and found that I didn't miss it in the least.'
